name: Edgy Coins
description:
Race friends in this fast-paced multiplayer endless roller and try to be the last coin rolling! Roll one of many available coins and use power-ups to get the advantage over other players.

There are more than two sides to a coin... You are going to be rolling on the third one.

Warning: The game might take a long time to load at startup while it shows only a black screen

Game made in 72 hours for UE4 Spring Jam 2019
